TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ApplicationServicesHostFactory extends System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactory

summary.span: 提供一个工厂类，它在托管承载环境中创建身份验证服务、角色服务和配置文件服务的实例。

span.span: Provides a factory class that creates instances of the authentication service, role service, and profile service in managed hosting environments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此工厂类提供一种方法创建的实例， ，和类。This factory class provides a way to create instances of the , , and classes. 若要使用此工厂类，创建一个 WCF 服务 (.svc) 文件，并指定中`ServiceHosting`属性`@ ServiceHost`指令。To use this factory class, create a WCF Service (.svc) file and specify in the `ServiceHosting` attribute of the `@ ServiceHost` directive. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定中`@ ServiceHost`要配置身份验证服务的.svc 文件的指令。The following example shows how to specify in the `@ ServiceHost` directive of a .svc file to configure the authentication service. ```csharp <%@ ServiceHost Language="C#" Service="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService" Factory="System.Web.ApplicationServices.ApplicationServicesHostFactory" %> ``` ```vb <%@ ServiceHost Language="VB" Service="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService" Factory="System.Web.ApplicationServices.ApplicationServicesHostFactory" %> ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost CreateServiceHost (Type serviceType, Uri[] baseAddresses);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost CreateServiceHost(class System.Type serviceType, class System.Uri[] baseAddresses) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateServiceHost (serviceType As Type, baseAddresses As Uri()) As ServiceHost
protected: override System::ServiceModel::ServiceHost ^ CreateServiceHost(Type ^ serviceType, cli::array <Uri ^> ^ baseAddresses);

param.name: serviceType
param.span: 要创建的服务主机的类型。

span.span: The type of service host to create.
An array of base addresses for the service.

summary.span: 为具有指定基址的服务类创建实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of the service class that has the specified base address or addresses.

returns.span: 具有指定的基址的服务类型的 实例。

span.span: A instance for the type of service that has the specified base address or addresses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常自动调用此方法由 Windows Communication Foundation 会在服务激活过程并无需手动调用方法。Usually this method is called automatically by Windows Communication Foundation as part of service activation, and you do not have to call the method manually.
